titleStmt.title: A discouerie of the countries of Tartaria, Scithia, & Cataya, by the northeast: with the maners, fashions, and orders which are vsed in those countries. / Set foorth by Iohn Frampton merchaunt.
titleStmt.author: Frampton, John, fl. 1577-1596.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Jmprinted at London at the three Cranes in the Vintree, :

notesStmt.note: Title within border of printers' ornaments; initials.
Imperfect: last leaf torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library.
